metadata.Title: CVE-2022-30284 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** In the python-libnmap package through 0.7.2 for Python,remote command execution can occur (if used in a client application thatdoes not validate arguments). NOTE: the vendor believes it would beunrealistic for an application to call NmapProcess with arguments takenfrom input data that arrived over an untrusted network, and thus the CVSSscore corresponds to an unrealistic use case. None of the NmapProcessdocumentation implies that this is an expected use case.

criterions.comment: python-libnmap package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
